title: Solr startup scripts should be executable
description: bin/* scripts in solr should be executable in the source.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1620478 from Anshum Gupta in branch 'dev/branches/branch_4x'

SOLR-6433: Solr startup scripts should be executable

comments.author: Anshum Gupta
comments.content: The trunk had this just fine. Fixed it on 4x.
